Articles.Content:
Yet another darn pretty picture of Saturn, by far the coolest of planets IMO.

Guess how many well know objects you can see in this picture: http://photojournal.jpl.nasa.gov/figures/PIA17172_fig1.jpg

Earth? Couple moons?... Guess again: http://photojournal.jpl.nasa.gov/figures/PIA17172_fig3.jpg

Full article here.

Oh man, imagine looking at something like Minas seen in the first picture (bigger) in KSP with that shadow an everything.
Why can't I wake up in the morning and see this picture on the front page of my news paper? I mean wtf that is... Beautiful. Just perfectly beautiful in every way.
